attributes.additional_details:
A petition to ensure a national debate on anything concerning devolution and independence for all the countries within the United Kingdom.
Debate to include:
English Parliament.
Devolved Max.
Independence for Scotland.
Independence for England.
Independence for Wales.
Independence for NI.
We the people of England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland would like a say in how the government runs the UK, based on the fairest and most democratic means of conveyance. A national debate.
